name: AzureIoTHubServiceClient
summary: Azure IoT Hub Service Client library for CocoaPods.
description: This is a CocoaPods release of the Azure C IoT Hub Service Client.
prepare_command:
# Keeping this script idempotent makes using it in a
# development situation much easier.
git submodule update --init deps/parson
rm -R inc > /dev/null 2>&1 || true
mkdir -p inc
cp deps/parson/parson.h inc
cp iothub_service_client/inc/*.h inc
cp iothub_client/inc/iothub_message.h inc
cp iothub_client/src/iothub_message.c iothub_service_client/src

# Assemble the module.modulemap file
pushd inc > /dev/null
echo "module AzureIoTHubServiceClient [system][extern_c] {" > module.modulemap
quote_thing='"'
for filename in *.h; do
    echo "    header $quote_thing$filename$quote_thing" >> module.modulemap
done
echo "    export *" >> module.modulemap
echo "}" >> module.modulemap
popd > /dev/null
# Done assembling module.modulemap file
